name: FoxySleep
description:
Foxy Sleep is a 2D platformer game where player will help a fox to get to this bed to sleep. To reach the bed there will be several platforms colored blue and red. Player needs   to change his color and climb the equivalent color platform. Opposite color between the player and platform and you will lose collision. This game was initially developed within 48 hours for Mini Jam 68. 

Background music: foxsynergy

Developer's Note: Hello Everyone, This game is in under development. So if you think the game needs any important update, feature, bug fix etc. You are free to email me your thoughts at chakravortyarunabh133@gmail.com. 

Best Regards,

ArunabhDev :)
